response.overview: In the last 15 years Spike and Mikeâ€™s Festival of Animation has an outstanding reputation for bringing together the most unique and outrageously funny animated short films. In the past the only place to see these films was at your neighbor-hood theatres. Now at last you have the opportunity to view with family and friends these silver screen gems in the comfort of your home. Two Academy Award Winners. Five countries. Fourteen of the Best Films in the World.
response.title: Spike & Mike's Festival of Animation
